>
[Steady Balance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5217) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 263 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You can keep your balance easily, even in adverse conditions. Whenever you roll a success using the Balance action, you get a critical success instead. You’re not off-guard while attempting to Balance on narrow surfaces and uneven ground.
name: Steady Balance
